title: My Haunted Hometown
overview: Think your hometown is safe? Think again. My Haunted Hometown will have you questioning everything you know about the town you love. This brand-new series is an immersive, original, and dynamic road trip to small and scary towns across North America.Following the terrifying stories of three paranormal witnesses per episode, we learn exactly how the past can come back to haunt you. We relive the most frightening moments of our witnesses' lives inside the harrowing location that the hauntings occurred in. And find out which spirits, ghosts, and demons also call these towns home.
